title: Syrian refugees - major hosting countries worldwide in 2018
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of admitted Syrian refugees for 10 number of Countrys.
The Number of admitted Syrian refugees is highest at Country Turkey and lowest at Country Netherlands.
The highest Country Turkey has 3590274.0 more Number of admitted Syrian refugees than the lowest Country Netherlands.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Number of admitted Syrian refugees in the y axis.
The maximum Number of admitted Syrian refugees 3622366.0 is found at Country Turkey and the minimum is found at Netherlands where Country is 32092.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of admitted Syrian refugees for 10 number of Countrys.
The Number of admitted Syrian refugees is highest at Country Turkey and lowest at Country Netherlands.
The highest Country Turkey has 3590274.0 more Number of admitted Syrian refugees than the lowest Country Netherlands.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Number of admitted Syrian refugees in the y axis.
Country Turkey has the highest Number of admitted Syrian refugees and Netherlands has the lowest Number of admitted Syrian refugees.
Second maximum Number of admitted Syrian refugees is found at Country Lebanon.
The difference of Number of admitted Syrian refugees between the highest and lowest Country is 3590274.0.
The Country Turkey has the highest Number of admitted Syrian refugees, followed by Lebanon, and Jordan. Down to the Country Netherlands which is the lowest.
The Country Netherlands has 5.62 times less Number of admitted Syrian refugees than average.
Summing up the values of all Countrys, we get total 6444408.0.
